name: Jalebi: A Desi Adda
summary: Let’s play all your favorite games – Word Search , Ludo , Snakes and Ladders , Quiz , Word Hunt and 4 Letters games in one single pack. India’s first-ever game center, Jalebi – A Word Game now becomes Jalebi – A Desi Adda with 6 games in 1 pack. Now play word search , Quiz , Word Hunt and 4 letters Word puzzle games in your own language (English, Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Bangla / Bengali, Odia, Malayalam, Kannada, Tamil and Telugu) and also you can play Ludo , Snake & Ladder with localized UI.
